La jugabilidad es muy cómoda y evoluciona mucho la presentada en el primer juego, sin dejar de lado sus raíces claro está. La historia si bien no es para nada profunda resulta muy interesante en especial las cosas referentes al Combine o la Alianza y al G-man, al mismo tiempo el hecho de que la historia resulte interesante es debido a que es contada en tiempo real lo que hace al jugador participe, pero no influyente, en todo el juego. Puede tener sus fallos pero para mí y cayendo en la subjetividad es un 10/10, recomendado al 100%

It's Half-life fucking 2. this is what all other modern single player first person shooters compare themselves to. the guns are varied and feel amazing to use, the gravity gun is an excellent use of the physics engine, the levels are a bit mazey but fun to navigate. The characters are well written (this game passes the bechdel test, even) and the facial animations look pretty good even now. they ain't the new hotness anymore but they don't give me the uncanny valley. it is annoying how you have limited run; i always find myself running from gunfire only to slow to a crawl cuz i ran out. your sprint and flashlight and breath use the same meter; give up on trying to see in the dark while swimming. all in all, it's a really good game, 8/10.

Esse jogo (onde vc é o G. Freeman) vc teve matar o D. Breen que quer matar vc tbm mais no final T U D O D E U E R R A D O os combines querem se vingar de vc nos três episódios vc finalmente consegue  mais no terceiro o Eli Vance (pai da Alxy Vance) morre com um final triste

Powiem szczerze... Half-Life 2 to jest jeden z moich ulubionych tytułów jaki obgrałem do dziś. To on wkręcił mnie w gry na PC, przez co zaprzestałem grania tylko na swojej konsoli. Mimo że gra ma już 18 lat na karku, dalej potrafi zaskoczyć wieloma rzeczami, między innymi zaawansowanym jak na swoje czasy silniku fizycznym, różnymi typami broni, od łoma po zaawansowane karabiny kombinatu, genialne przedstawieniem brudnego świata post-apo, poprzez otoczenie, oraz przeciwników i porządną fabułą kontynuowaną później w epizodach.

Generalnie Half-Life 2 to gra, która według mnie prześcignęła swoje czasy i warto chociaż na chwilę do niej wrócić. Tak więc polecam założyć wam pancerz HeV, bo w wielu momentach jest to jazda, bez trzymanki.
absolutely AMAZING game, phenomenal story, immersive gameplay, good graphics for 2004, and makes you feel badass.

[h1] 언제쯤 차에서 내리나요. 프리맨... [/h1]

전작보다 훨씬 뛰어난 그래픽으로 업그레이드 되었고 특유의 물리엔진을 사용하여 여러 사물과 상호작용을 유도하는 방식의 게임성을 보여준다. 상당히 넓은 오픈 월드를 돌아다니기 때문에 탈것을 타거나 넓은 도시를 해집고 다니는 경우가 많아졌다. 다만 탈것으로 오픈 월드를 돌아다니는 방식은 이미 3년이나 전에 헤일로1에서 보여준 요소라서 흥미롭거나 신선한 느낌을 받지 못했는데 생각보다 이 파트가 너무 길어서 개인적으로 아쉬웠다. 

요즘 FPS 게임들과 조작감이 미세하게 다르기 때문에 약간의 세팅이 필요하다. 본격적으로 세계관과 캐릭터들이 자리를 잡은 작품이고 상당히 뛰어난 수준의 한국어 더빙을 통해서 이야기의 몰입이 쉽게 되는 매우 좋은 작품인 것은 틀림이 없다. 

[h1]Rating [/h1]
8/10

게임성 8/10
스토리 8/10
영상미 9/10 

[h1]장점 [/h1]
+ 당시 기준으로 화려한 그래픽
+ 물리 엔진을 잘 활용한 게임성
+ 여전히 흥미로운 세계관과 캐릭터들
+ 풀 더빙 한글화

[h1]단점 [/h1]
- 너무 지루하고 긴 일부 구간들

This game is so good it's hard to believe it was released in 2004. There is non-stop action driven by an interesting story and mysterious characters. The game still holds up really well, and despite knowing it is a 2004 game, it has a real sense of reality about it and an odd way of getting into your head. 

The controls are very precise, the only downside being sometimes you can infuriatingly get stuck on things, or the gravity gun requires a few clicks to throw the object you want. But overall it feels very fluid. On the first playthrough, it can seem like each level is really long, which sometimes makes it a bit tedious (e.g. some people say the airboat level is too long), but this makes for a satisfying amount of each level before moving on - i.e. once you're done with the airboat, that's it. 

The game isn't scary so much as it has many jump scare moments and a very melancholic atmosphere about it. I mention this because there are probably many like me who don't usually like anything too horror driven. I hadn't played this game in the past because of that, and certainly this game is the absolute limit. But I am glad I have finally given it a go and experienced this classic game. It was great to play it after Portal, I had no idea the two were connected.

As they were making Half-Life 2, Gabe Newell stated that if they "weren't making an FPS to redefine the genere, then why bother?" I am happy to state that VALVe followed through on that promise, producing one of the most impressive, visually stunning, technologically advanced, and well written FPS games of all time. If you haven't played this game (for some reason,) give it a try. It certainly surprised me.
